general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs and initiatives offered by Sharda University, including academic offerings from its Schools of Dental, Medical, and Nursing Sciences, as well as administrative reports and student-focused services. It highlights areas such as curriculum development, student support (mentoring, counseling, skill enhancement), university governance, historical information, tenders, legal frameworks, and external collaborations like the International Credit Transfer Programme. The list also touches upon specific initiatives like the FM Radio station, entrepreneurship, and awareness of technological trends.
